/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.5/cuda/12.4/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -ccbin=/opt/cray/pe/craype/2.7.32/bin/CC  -G --expt-relaxed-constexpr --expt-extended-lambda -g --generate-code=arch=compute_52,code=[compute_52,sm_52] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/forallTest.dir/forallTest.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/forallTest.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -lmpi -lcuda -lnvToolsExt -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
